text:
(Testimonials) Guidelines
SPECIAL USES MUCH MORE IN THE WAY OF LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES
(1) Advanced instruction to capable high school seniors
(2) Specialized instruction for extremely bright children
over and beyond their regular school worko
(3) May provide special education for children who are slow
in school work.
(4) Pre-school experience for those about to enter the first
grade and parent education for school readiness.
